Acceptance criteria - Have all posts been installed in accordance with the following requirements:
– Posts shall be vertical with a maximum deviation of 1 in 100
– Post tops shall be 50mm (+/- 10mm) below the top edge of the sign

– Sign surface shall present an even surface free from faults
